underestimate.translation[0].definitions: to think or guess that something is smaller, cheaper, easier etc than it really is
Never underestimate the power of the press.
underestimate the importance/extent/effect/power etc of something
We underestimated how long it would take to get there.
to think that someone is not as good, clever, or skilful, as they really are
underestimate.translation[1].definitions: a guessed amount or number that is too low
Fourteen percent may be an underestimate.
underestimate.translation[2].definitions: to think that something is smaller than it really is
The official statistics seriously underestimate actual unemployment.
